╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │

│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │

│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │

│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

│ active edges.                                                                │

│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │

│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │

│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

│ trends.                                                                      │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │

╭─────────────────────────────────── Legend ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ Legend: S=self (center), A=other agents.                                     │
│ Employment panel turns red when pending queue > 0.                           │
│ Conflict panel highlights queue cooldowns/ghost steps; rivalry count shows   │
│ active edges.                                                                │
│ Anneal panel uses green/yellow/red to reflect BC pass/fail and drift flags.  │
│ Policy Inspector lists per-agent top actions and probabilities.              │
│ Relationship Overlay shows top ties with trust/familiarity/rivalry deltas.   │
│ KPI Panel tracks queue intensity, lateness, and late help with colour-coded  │
│ trends.                                                                      │
│ Relationships panel displays eviction churn; updates table lists recent tie  │
│ changes.                                                                     │
│ Social panel highlights top friends/rivals, churn aggregates, and recent     │
│ chats/avoidance.                                                             │
│ Narrations panel lists throttled conflict narrations (! marks priority       │
│ entries).                                                                    │
